Donations

Donation Tracker

At Woods Waves and Wonders, we are committed to being transparent about our giving and the impact we are making. We believe that it is important to track the amount of money we donate based on purchases made by our customers. Here's how it works: for every product sold on our website, a portion of the proceeds will be donated to one of the organizations listed below. Each organization was specifically chosen to reflect both the theme of our product and to have the most positive impact for that particular cause.  We keep track of the total amount of money donated on a regular basis, and we will report this information to our customers on our website regularly.

We believe that by being transparent about our giving, we can build trust and inspire others to make a positive impact in the world. We are committed to using our business as a force for good, and we hope that our customers will join us in supporting the important work of making a difference in the world. Thank you for being a part of our community, and for helping us create a better world for all.
